NAME: Late Route Trips
WARNING_ACTION:
1. Notify Dock SDO or expeditors of missing scan.  
2. Scan truck arrived.
3. Retrain employee on scanning requirements.
CRITICAL_ACTION:
1. Notify Dock SDO or expeditors of missing scan.  
2. Scan truck arrived.
3. Retrain employee on scanning requirements.
